title: Badajoz
description: The Castillian city of Badajoz was an Islamic foundation under the Muladi nobleman Ibn Marwan who established the city ca. 875. Badajoz was eventually invaded by (and captured by) Christians under Alfonso VI of Castile. Alfonso X established a bishopric and began work on the Cathedral of San Juan Bautista.

properties.description: Representative location of modern Badajoz, Spain, based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Badajoz
